availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Fanny Oberdorfer Block (Louisville, Kentucky, fancy store owner)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, resident. Native of Bavaria. Married to Moses Block. Mother of Dora Block, Caroline Block, Clara Block, Joseph Block, and Amelia Block.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 8, p. 226; Find A Grave, "Fanny Oberdorfer Block (1816-1866)," Memorial #129171790, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=129171790 (accessed June 21, 2017); KYR-0001-029-0522.
